name: Save The Artist
description:
Made for the I Can't draw but I want to make a game (again) Jam.

Controls (Explained in game but here's a reference anyway):

Keyboard:

A+D/Arrow Keys - Move left and right

Space - Jump

E - Speed up text

Esc - Open Settings for Sound and Quit to menu button

X - Skip Opening Cutscene

Controller (Going off my Xbox360 controller here):

Right Joystick - Move left and right

A - Jump

X - Skip Text
